queries.query: select plain_long_0 + 1 as res0, plain_long_0 + 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 + 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 + plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 + plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 + plain_float_1 as res5 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 + 1 as res0, plain_long_0 + 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 + 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 + plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 + plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 + plain_float_1 as res5 from alice.tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;

queries.name: arithmetic (subtract) where(null)
queries.query: select plain_long_0 - 1 as res0, plain_long_0 - 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 - 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 - plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 - plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 - plain_float_1 as res5 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 - 1 as res0, plain_long_0 - 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 - 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 - plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 - plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 - plain_float_1 as res5 from alice.tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;

queries.name: arithmetic (multiply) where(null)
queries.query: select plain_long_0 * 1 as res0, plain_long_0 * 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 * 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 * plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 * plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 * plain_float_1 as res5 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 * 1 as res0, plain_long_0 * 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 * 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 * plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 * plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 * plain_float_1 as res5 from alice.tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;

queries.name: arithmetic (divide) where(null)
queries.query: select plain_long_0 / 1 as res0, plain_long_0 / 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 / 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 / plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 / plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 / plain_float_1 as res5 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 / 1 as res0, plain_long_0 / 1.5 as res1, plain_float_0 / 1.5 as res2, plain_long_0 / plain_long_1 as res3, plain_long_0 / plain_float_0 as res4, plain_float_0 / plain_float_1 as res5 from alice.tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;

queries.name: arithmetic (model) where(null)
queries.query: select plain_long_0 % 1 as res0, plain_long_0 % plain_long_1 as res1 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 % 1 as res0,  plain_long_0 % plain_long_1 as res1 from alice.tbl_1 as alice where alice.plain_long_0 > alice.plain_long_1;

queries.name: case when
queries.query: select plain_long_0, plain_long_1, case when plain_long_0 >= 5  then -1 else (plain_long_0 / plain_long_1) end as r from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, plain_long_1, case when plain_long_0 >= 5  then -1 else (plain_long_0 / plain_long_1) end as r from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: concat
queries.query: select concat(plain_string_0, plain_string_1) as concat_col from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select concat(plain_string_0, plain_string_1) as concat_col from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: substring
queries.query: select substring(plain_string_0, 2, 3) as t from scdb.alice_tbl_1 where substring(plain_string_0, 2) != '';
queries.mysql_query: select substring(plain_string_0, 2, 3) as t from alice.tbl_1 where substring(plain_string_0, 2) != '';

queries.name: apply in
queries.query: select plain_long_0 in (select plain_long_0 from scdb.alice_tbl_1) as tt, plain_long_0 not in (select plain_long_0 from scdb.alice_tbl_1) as ff from scdb.alice_tbl_0
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 in (select plain_long_0 from alice.tbl_1) as tt, plain_long_0 not in (select plain_long_0 from alice.tbl_1) as ff from alice.tbl_0

queries.name: where in subquery
queries.query: select plain_long_0 from scdb.alice_tbl_0 as alice where plain_long_0 in (select plain_long_0 from scdb.alice_tbl_1)
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 from alice.tbl_0 where plain_long_0 in (select plain_long_0 from alice.tbl_1)

queries.name: where in subquery
queries.query: select plain_long_0 from scdb.alice_tbl_0 as alice where (plain_long_0 in (select plain_long_0 from scdb.alice_tbl_1 as alice)) and plain_long_0 > 0
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0 from alice.tbl_0 where (plain_long_0 in (select plain_long_0 from alice.tbl_1)) and plain_long_0 > 0

queries.name: date func (now, curdate, last_day, str_to_date, date_format)
queries.query: select plain_datetime_0 < now() as res1, plain_timestamp_0 < now() as res2, plain_datetime_0 < curdate() as res3, plain_timestamp_0 < curdate() as res4, last_day(plain_datetime_0) as res5, last_day(plain_timestamp_0) as res6, str_to_date('August 10 2017', '%M %d %Y') as res7, date_format(plain_datetime_0, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as res8 from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_datetime_0 < now() as res1, plain_timestamp_0 < now() as res2, plain_datetime_0 < curdate() as res3, plain_timestamp_0 < curdate() as res4, last_day(plain_datetime_0) as res5, last_day(plain_timestamp_0) as res6, str_to_date('August 10 2017', '%M %d %Y') as res7, date_format(plain_datetime_0, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as res8 from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: date func (adddate, subdate)
queries.query: select adddate(plain_datetime_0, interval 10 day) as res1, adddate(plain_timestamp_0, interval 10 day) as res2, subdate(plain_datetime_0, interval 10 day) as res3, subdate(plain_timestamp_0, interval 10 day) as res4 from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select adddate(plain_datetime_0, interval 10 day) as res1, adddate(plain_timestamp_0, interval 10 day) as res2, subdate(plain_datetime_0, interval 10 day) as res3, subdate(plain_timestamp_0, interval 10 day) as res4 from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: date func (datediff)
queries.query: select datediff(plain_datetime_0, plain_datetime_1) as res1, datediff(plain_timestamp_0, plain_timestamp_1) as res2 from scdb.alice_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select datediff(plain_datetime_0, plain_datetime_1) as res1, datediff(plain_timestamp_0, plain_timestamp_1) as res2 from alice.tbl_1;

queries.name: plain select (csv)
queries.query: select plain_long_0, plain_datetime_0, plain_timestamp_0 from scdb.bob_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select plain_long_0, plain_datetime_0, plain_timestamp_0 from bob.tbl_1

queries.name: date func (now, curdate, last_day, str_to_date, date_format) (csv)
queries.query: select '2020-01-01 00:00:00' < curdate() as res1, last_day(plain_datetime_0) as res2, last_day(plain_timestamp_0) as res3, str_to_date('2017/08/10', '%Y/%m/%d') as res4, date_format(plain_datetime_0, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') as res5 from scdb.bob_tbl_1;
queries.mysql_query: select '2020-01-01 00:00:00' < curdate() as res1, last_day(plain_datetime_0) as res2, last_day(plain_timestamp_0) as res3, str_to_date('2017/08/10', '%Y/%m/%d') as res4, date_format(plain_datetime_0, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as res5 from bob.tbl_1;
